title: Radians to Degrees
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of converting angles from radians to degrees in JavaScript. You will learn how to use the radian to degree formula and the built-in `Math.PI` constant to convert angles. Through practical exercises, you will gain hands-on experience with this conversion process and enhance your understanding of trigonometry in JavaScript.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
